title: gurunadapriya
sahitya: gurunAthapriyA shrI gaNanAthanE !karuNAkaranE kaDaikkaN aruL pozhiyum  anupallavi  irai kaDal kaDandu nin divya padam nADumiRai anbarkkaruLum nityanE nimalanE !  caraNampAsa bhandha nivAraNam tandiDapAshangusandanai karamdanil EndiyaIsan maganE ! paranE ! (jagadIshan) IDiNai illAdanAshville nagar mEvum naLina poRpAdanE!
